pages.title: Pearl Upgrade Template
pages.text: This is used to upgrade a diamond pickaxe to the "Pearl" level.$(br2) This is made from Spouting "Liquid Green Dragon Essence" onto a "Netherite Upgrade Template".
This pickaxe is required to mine the "Pearl Crystal Ore".
Can only be mined with a "Pearl Pickaxe" or higher.
Made from compacting "Pearl Crystal Dust", "Clay Balls", and "Lava".

pages.title: Blazing Essence
pages.text: Obtained from killing the "Thermospherical Shard of the Dragon".

pages.title: Liquid Green Essence
pages.text: Obtained from draining a "Blazing Dragon Essence" item.
Obtained from a Sequenced Assembly starting with "Charged Pearl Crystal Brick", and adding to it "Pearl Crystal", and "Liquid Green Dragon Essence".
